body:
The FCam (Frankencamera) is an open-source camera project. It is 
running on Nokia N900s and custom hardware at Stanford. Has anyone one 
this list experimented with it?


<http://graphics.stanford.edu/projects/camera-2.0/>
<http://graphics.stanford.edu/papers/fcam/html/>


...any word about the FCam F3?


(This is also a test of the new list server.)


Randolph M. Fritz • RFritz at lbl.gov
Environmental Energy Technologies Division • Lawrence Berkeley Labs
___
